# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_rescompiler_bin
  TOOL_rescompiler_dependency
  tools/rescompiler/bin
  rescompiler
)

add_executable(ydb-core-tablet_flat-ut)


target_include_directories(ydb-core-tablet_flat-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat
)

target_link_libraries(ydb-core-tablet_flat-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  ydb-core-tablet_flat
  library-cpp-resource
  ydb-core-scheme
  test-libs-exec
  test-libs-table
  core-testlib-default
  udf-service-exception_policy
)

target_allocator(ydb-core-tablet_flat-ut
  cpp-malloc-jemalloc
)

target_link_options(ydb-core-tablet_flat-ut PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
  -lutil
)

target_sources(ydb-core-tablet_flat-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/datetime_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/decimal_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/flat_cxx_database_ut.cpp

  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/flat_row_versions_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/flat_table_part_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/flat_test_db.cpp

  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/ut_stat.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/ut_comp_gen.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/ut_compaction.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/ut_compaction_multi.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/ut_charge.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/ut_part.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/ut_part_multi.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/ut_proto.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/ut_pages.cpp

  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/ut_rename_table_column.cpp

  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/ut_forward.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/ut_screen.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/ut_bloom.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/ut_shared_sausagecache.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/ut_slice.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/ut_slice_loader.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/ut_versions.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/6cf77686c9ddf4f7a8a150d2405a77e7.cpp

  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/flat_test_db_helpers.h
)


set_property(
  TARGET
  ydb-core-tablet_flat-ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  10
)

add_yunittest(
  NAME
  ydb-core-tablet_flat-ut
  TEST_TARGET
  ydb-core-tablet_flat-ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-tablet_flat-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-tablet_flat-ut
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-tablet_flat-ut
  PROPERTY
  TIMEOUT
  600
)

resources(ydb-core-tablet_flat-ut
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/ut/6cf77686c9ddf4f7a8a150d2405a77e7.cpp
  INPUTS
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/test/data/002_full_part.pages
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tablet_flat/test/data/008_basics_db.redo
  KEYS
  abi/002_full_part.pages
  abi/008_basics_db.redo
)

vcs_info(ydb-core-tablet_flat-ut)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-tablet_flat-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
